Services.title: Our Services
Services.subtitle: Comprehensive engineering, construction, and infrastructure services delivered with quality, safety, and sustainability at the forefront.

electrical.title: Electrical Services
electrical.summary: Complete electrical installations, wiring, panel upgrades, and maintenance for all project types. We ensure efficient energy distribution and safe installations for residential, commercial, and industrial projects.

plumbing.title: Plumbing & Pipelines
plumbing.summary: Professional plumbing installations, pipeline systems, and water management solutions tailored to meet modern infrastructure needs.
items: Drainage & sewage systems with clog protection

structural.title: Structural Work
structural.summary: Foundation work, concrete structures, steel framing, and all structural construction needs are met with precision and durability.

hvac.title: HVAC Systems
hvac.summary: Heating, ventilation, and air conditioning systems for optimal climate control, designed with efficiency and sustainability in mind.
items: Ventilation design for air quality & circulation

general.title: General Construction
general.summary: Complete construction services including renovations, additions, and new builds, tailored to each client‚Äôs vision and needs.

safety.title: Safety & Compliance
safety.summary: Ensuring all work meets safety standards and building codes with proper certifications and transparent documentation.

Projects.title: Our Projects
Projects.subtitle: Discover our portfolio of ambitious projects for renowned public and private clients across Saudi Arabia and the UAE, spanning key industries: energy, infrastructure, housing, water, transport, and more.

aramco.title: Saudi Aramco
aramco.description: We executed electrical, mechanical, and structural works for key Saudi Aramco facilities, focusing on energy efficiency, industrial safety, and adherence to global oil & gas standards.

royal_commission.title: Royal Commission Jubail, Yanbu & Jizan
royal_commission.description: Our collaboration with the Royal Commission included infrastructure development, HVAC installation, and general construction within industrial cities, supporting Saudi Arabia's Vision 2030 goals.

housing.title: Ministry of Housing
housing.description: We supported national housing projects by providing electrical, plumbing, and structural services to ensure quality living spaces across newly developed residential zones.

municipal.title: Ministry of Municipal & Rural Affairs
municipal.description: We contributed to municipal infrastructure by executing pipeline networks, drainage systems, and urban renovation projects that enhanced the sustainability and liveability of rural and urban areas.

water_electricity.title: Ministry of Water & Electricity
water_electricity.description: Our services included installation and maintenance of water supply lines, power distribution systems, and smart energy solutions to meet critical utility needs across various regions.

transportation.title: Ministry of Transportation
transportation.description: We carried out essential civil and structural works related to transportation infrastructure such as bridges, roadside facilities, and support structures, ensuring compliance with transportation safety codes.

Salini.title: Salini Saudi Arabia
Salini.description: Structural & building construction support for mega projects. We are actively involved in Salini‚Äôs high-rise and infrastructure projects, delivering full-scale building construction services. Our scope includes foundation work, concrete casting, steel structure erection, and blockwork, ensuring structural durability and adherence to international standards.

Skylark.title: Skylark
Skylark.description: Residential and commercial building construction. We‚Äôve partnered with Skylark to execute complete building construction for residential villas and commercial facilities. Our services include civil structure work, internal finishing, electrical and plumbing installations, and external works, delivered with precision and on-time execution.

header.title: About Us
header.description: Rayyan Al-Arab General Contracting Co. delivers excellence across Saudi Arabia and the UAE through innovative construction solutions.

who_we_are.title: Who We Are
who_we_are.description: We provide end-to-end services for residential, commercial, and industrial sectors with a reputation built on quality, integrity, and client satisfaction.

our_vision.title: Our Vision
our_vision.description: To deliver reliable, cost-effective engineering solutions while ensuring safety, sustainability, and customer delight at every project stage.

our_mission.title: Our Mission
our_mission.description: Combining technical expertise, innovation, and collaboration to build lasting structures that fuel economic and social growth.

residential.title: Residential Construction
residential.description: Custom homes and apartment complexes designed to the highest standards.

commercial.title: Commercial Projects
commercial.description: Offices, retail spaces, and mixed-use developments tailored to business needs.

industrial.title: Industrial Facilities
industrial.description: Robust structures engineered for heavy industry and logistics.

design.title: Design & Build Solutions

integrity.title: Integrity

innovation.title: Innovation
